Title: Relates to requiring the department of transportation to prepare a plan for every public transportation system to be eligible to receive assistance in the purchase of new zero-emission buses or vehicles
Summary: Relates to requiring the department of transportation to prepare a plan for every public transportation system to be eligible to receive operating assistance in the purchase of new zero-emission buses or vehicles.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to prepare a plan for every public transportation system to be eligible to receive operating assistance in the purchase of any new zero-emission buses or other municipal zero-emission vehicles
